name: Goldberg Nature
description:
Goldberg Nature is a peaceful strategy/puzzle game where you build your own ecosystem. You start with an empty Goldberg Polyhedron and populate it with different biomes and animals.

There are five different biomes with several different plants and animals:

  • Ocean
  • Desert
  • Polar Region
  • Temperate
  • Tropical

Note: Early Prototype!

Controls:
Left Click to place a tile
Press and hold right mouse button to pan the camera.
Mouse wheel to zoom in/out.

The Web build also (kinda) works on mobile devices, but since you don't have a right mouse button, you must pan the camera by dragging two fingers around the screen.
